short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for sending SMS & making Text-To-Speech calls via Sms77.io

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Send SMS and issue text-to-speech calls via the seven.io SMS gateway.

Parse all phone numbers from a website and for mass messaging and calling.

You need an seven.io API key for messaging and calling.
long.de: This Chrome Extension allows you to send SMS via the SMS77.io SMS gateway. You need an sms77.io API key in order to send SMS.
